perks.name: Block Break
perks.desc: Shots will penetrate enemy Block Stances, dealing 50% of the usual Damage

perks.name: Melee Mastery
perks.desc: Melee Damage increases by 20% against Majoris-level and higher enemies

perks.name: Medicae Adept
perks.desc: You revive Squad members 30% faster

perks.name: High Capacity
perks.desc: The maximum amount of Ammo you can carry increases by 10%

perks.name: Vantage Point
perks.desc: Remaining stationary for 2 seconds increases your Ranged Weapons' Damage by 20%

perks.name: Adaptability
perks.desc: Reloading while having Low Ammo or manually activating Camo Cloak increases Melee Damage by 25% for 10 seconds

perks.name: Iron Grip
perks.desc: Weapon Spread and Recoil are reduced by 20% and Ranged Damage against Terminus-level enemies is increased by 15% for Bolt Sniper Rifles and Stalker Bolt Rifles

perks.name: Dexterous Hands
perks.desc: Bolt Carbines reload 20% faster, and their Weapon Spread and Recoil are reduced by 15%

perks.name: Lethal Efficiency
perks.desc: Killing more than 1 enemy with one shot from a Las Fusil restores its charge by 1

perks.name: Marksmanship
perks.desc: Headshot Damage increases by 10% for all Squad Members

perks.name: Precision Targeting
perks.desc: Weapon Spread is reduced by 25% and Ranged Damage against Extremis-level enemies is increased by 15% for all Squad Members

perks.name: Squad Renewal
perks.desc: A Headshot kill restores Ability Charge by 10% for any Squad Member

perks.name: Purification
perks.desc: Manually activating Camo Cloak removes negative Status Effects and restores all Contested Health

perks.name: Efficient Readiness
perks.desc: Camo Cloak increases movement speed by 20%, and manually activating Camo Cloak automatically reloads Ranged Weapons

perks.name: Renewal
perks.desc: A Headshot kill restores Camo Cloak's Charge by 5%

perks.name: Guardian Protocol
perks.desc: When you are reviving a Squad Member, Camo Cloak hides you and the Squad Member for 5 seconds without spending Charge. Cooldown is 30 seconds.

perks.name: Targeted Shot
perks.desc: The first Ranged Attack that breaks Camo Cloak deals 75% more Damage

perks.name: Tactical Ambush
perks.desc: The first Melee Attack that breaks Camo Cloak deals 150% more Damage

perks.name: Persistence
perks.desc: When Camo Cloak deactivates, you take 20% less Health Damage, do not lose control upon taking Heavy Hits, and cannot be knocked back for 10 seconds

perks.name: Lingering Concealment
perks.desc: After performing an attack that breaks Camo Cloak, you remain hidden for 2 seconds

perks.name: Ambush
perks.desc: When Camo Cloak deactivates, it startles nearby enemies. They will temporarily lose control or get knocked back. Cooldown is 25 seconds.

perks.name: Evasion
perks.desc: After a perfectly timed Dodge, Camo Cloak automatically activates without spending Charge for 5 seconds. Cooldown is 30 seconds.

perks.name: Emergency Override
perks.desc: When you receive Lethal Damage, Camo Cloak automatically activates without spending Charge and you become Invulnerable for 5 seconds. Cooldown is 180 seconds.

perks.name: Pattern of Excellence
perks.desc: Performing 3 consecutive Headshots restores Equipment Charge by 1. Cooldown is 30 seconds.

prestige.name: Emperor's Grace
prestige.desc: When Camo Cloak activates, you become Invulnerable to Damage for 2 seconds

prestige.name: Versatile Precision
prestige.desc: Performing a kill with your Secondary Weapon restores 15% of your Primary Weapon's Ammo. Cooldown is 15 seconds

prestige.name: Versatility
prestige.desc: After switching Weapons, your Secondary Weapon does 20% more Damage. The effect lasts until reloading or switching back to your Primary Weapon

prestige.name: Indomitable Spirit
prestige.desc: While performing a Gun Strike, you do not lose control upon taking Heavy Hits and you cannot be knocked back

prestige.name: Conviction
prestige.desc: When your Armour is fully depleted, you take 25% less Health Damage for 15 seconds

prestige.name: Exacting Focus
prestige.desc: After a Gun Strike, you deal 20% more Ranged Damage for 10 seconds.
